      • createOrGetUser

        public User createOrGetUser(Discourse discourse,
                            String username)
        Returns a User object with the given username and a given discourse if it exists or creates a new User entity with that username and that discourse.
        Parameters:
        discourse - the discourse in which the user was active
        username - username of the requested user
        Returns:
        the User object with the given username - either retrieved or newly created

      • createOrGetUser

        public User createOrGetUser(Discourse discourse,
                            String username,
                            String sourceId,
                            String sourceIdDescriptor,
                            DataSourceTypes dataSourceType,
                            String dataSetName)
        Returns a User object with the given source id and username if it exists or creates a new User entity with that username, stores it in the database and returns the entity object.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the user id assigned by the source system
        sourceDescriptor - defines where the sourceId is defined in the source data (e.g. "user.id" if it is a user table with field id)
        username - the username of the requested user
        Returns:
        the User object with the given username and source id- either retrieved or newly created

      • createContributionInteraction

        public ContributionInteraction createContributionInteraction(User user,
                                                             Contribution contrib,
                                                             ContributionInteractionTypes type)
        Creates a new ContributionInteraction of the provided type and applies it to the provided user and contribution. A connection to a content entity is optional and is not established by this method. This is necessary e.g. for REVERT interactions.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to interact with the provided contribution
        contrib - the contribution the provided user interacts with
        type - the type of the interaction
        Returns:
        the ContributionInteraction object after being saved to the database. If it already existed, the existing entity will be retrieved and returned.

      • createDiscoursePartInteraction

        public DiscoursePartInteraction createDiscoursePartInteraction(User user,
                                                               DiscoursePart dp,
                                                               DiscoursePartInteractionTypes type)
        Creates a new DiscoursePartInteraction of the provided type and applies it to the provided user and discoursepart.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to interact with the provided contribution
        dp - the discoursepart the provided user interacts with
        type - the type of the interaction
        Returns:
        the DiscoursePartInteraction object after being saved to the database. If it already existed, the existing entity will be retrieved and returned.

      • createUserRelation

        public UserRelation createUserRelation(User sourceUser,
                                       User targetUser,
                                       UserRelationTypes type)
        Creates a new UserRelation of the provided type and applies it to the provided source and target user.
        Parameters:
        sourceUser - the user that establishes the relation (e.g. follower))
        targetUser - the user that is the target of the relation (e.g. followee))
        type - the type of the relation
        Returns:
        the UserRelation object after being saved to the database. If it already existed, the existing entity will be retrieved and returned.

      • setRealname

        public User setRealname(User user,
                        String firstName,
                        String lastName)
        This method is a convenience method to build a single real name from a first and a last name (each of which might be empty) Sets the real name of the given user based on a given first and last name. Either first or last name (or both) may be empty - the real name is assembled accordingly. If a realname was already set before, no operation is performed. The name is not updated.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to update
        firstName - the first name of the user
        lastName - the last name of the user
        Returns:
        the user with updated or unchanged realname

      • save

        public User save(User user)
        Calls the save method of the user repository, saves the provided User entity and returns it after the save process
        Parameters:
        user - the user entity to save
        Returns:
        the user entity after the save process

      • delete

        public void delete(User user)
        Removes user from all their discourses and then deletes it by calling the delete method in the user repository.
        Parameters:
        user - the user entity to delete

      • findUserByUsername

        public List<User> findUserByUsername(String username)
        Retrieves all users with the given user name. Usernames are unique within a discourse, but there might be multiple users with the same username across discourses.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the users to retrieve.
